text: It suggests that the illusion you're in fact creating machine gods is getting things entirely backwards.
It's right there in the word.
Decades of scientific study of western societies has finally discovered the physical basis of acute mental illness: metropolitan urbanism. ...
... For the Anglosphere, especially, immediately and totally disenfranchising all denizens of the top five metro areas in each nation should be considered an urgent psychiatric priority.
... Allowing Londoners or New Yorkers to vote makes letting toddlers play with a box of hand-grenades look like responsible parenting.
I'm swamped right now, and scarcely dealing with concise urgent communications, so encouraging you to send this to me would just be abusive.
Every time Joel Berry posts, millions of American Republican voters are reminded of the self-defeating clown show they've escaped from.
Everybody keeps reminding me that Khomeini had 30,000 leftists executed, but I still don't like him.

Jews are way too interesting for their own good. Guessing the majority of Jew obsession is 'bad for the Jews' but there's plenty on the other side of the ledger (in both cases understandably). There are more Hutus than Jews in the world in case you're easily distracted.

... "So why aren't Hutus as interesting as Jews?"
"Let me explain, non-racistly ..."

... If you woke up tomorrow and every Hutu on earth had disappeared you probably wouldn't notice. If Jews had disappeared you'd either be in a world without divine engagement, or in one cleansed wholly of corruption, according to fractionally distinct theopolitical preference.
Tutsis are the closest thing to African Jews, so it would have just confused everyone to have invoked them.
